1.content: A new born fawn called Kingsley got up on to his feet and looked at his mother with a smile on his face. Kingsley was a beautiful little white tail fawn with a unusual eye colour, His eyes are a striking blue. Kingsley's mother was a tall and somewhat fat white tailed doe. She was somewhat smarter than the average deer. her eyes are light brown with long eyelashes. Her coat was a dark brown with a cream stripe going down along her neck. Kingsley's mother then got up off the floor and started to
1.title: New born in spring.

choices: "ok mother lets go to the tree pleasse"
" no I dont want to go what if the hunters get me"
11.content: He laughed as his mother licked him on the face. "stop it mother that tickles" he said to his mother. Over the next few weeks Kingsley got a new scarf to go around his neck, the scarf was blue in colour. "I love this new scarf mother its nice and warm" said Kingsley to his mother "I am glad that you love it Kingsley. I got it from a strange shop in the forest" said Kingsley's mother. Kingsley had stared to walk by him self with out any help from his mother. "I would like to take you to the colourful tree near the edge of frost" said Kingsley's mother. Kingsley said
11.title: licked kinglsy on the face.

choices: Follow the river north to the colourful tree
Put her self and Kingsley's life in danger by trying to cross the river
Turn back over the bridge and go back to the thicket
111.content: Kingsley and his mother set off for the colourful tree that was at the edge of the forest. Kingsley's mother told Kingsley not to run to far ahead of her. They both stopped walking when a bridge came into view. Kingsley's mother needed to check that the old wooden bridge was safe before they could cross over it. She checked that no one was hiding on or under the bridge by looking for anything out the ordinary. It was safe for Kingsley and his mother to cross the bridge. Soon Kingsley and his mother found the river that flows north to the colourful tree. Kingsley's mother then decided to
111.title: "ok mother lets go to the tree pleasse"

choices: with anger and frustration in her eyes
1111.content:
Kingsley and his mother followed the river north as far as they could go. Eventually the river started to turn east near a few old trees.
Kingsley then went with his mother down a dirt path that headed north to a big meadow with a colourful tree in the middle of it.
When they got to the meadow Kingsley's mother said to Kingsley "stop and listen to me. I need you to wait here until I call you out to me". "what did we need to stop for mother ?" said Kingsley to his mother " we needed to stop because I don't know if its safe for us to go to the colourful tree" said his mother. She looked and listened to any slight movement in the meadow while she moved ever so slowly forward towards the tree in the middle of the meadow. When she got to the tree she looked around once more for any sign of danger she then called Kingsley to come out of hiding. Kingsley then skipped and jumped to his mother waiting by the tree for him. when he got there she showed him all the different colours of the tree. "can you see the colours of the leafs Kingsley" said Kingsley's mother " yes I can mother. Can you see the red leafs mother" said Kingsley to his mother "no I can't see the red ones. I am colour blind you must be the one the great owl had predicted some time go" she then looked at her son with
1111.title: Follow the river north to the colourful tree

choices: something move in the tall grass.
11111.content: that She hugged him with as much love as she could give to him. Kingsley give out a little cry of joy when his mother hugged him as tight as a pillow. Kingsley and his mother then went and sat down in the tall grass in the meadow. They picked some flowers to eat with each other the flowers where very tasty. Kingsley ate some sun flowers while his mother ate some roses. Kingsley then went to sleep next to his mother. Kingsley's mother made sure to keep a lookout for danger while her son was sleeping next to her. She had seen
11111.title: with happiness in her eyes

choices: Tried to kill each others little fawn
111112.content:
It was a another fawn running, towards her with it's mother close behind it. The fawn introduced him self to Kingsley's mother " hello my name is Bambi, what's going on here ? " said the fawn. Kingsley's mother responded to Bambi's question " It's nice to meet you Bambi as you can see my son Kingsley is sleeping at the moment. Did you see the colourful tree yet ? " "yes I have seen the colourful tree before. I think I hear my mother calling me back bye" said Bambi. Bambi went over to his mother, Kingsley's mother then gave Bambi's mother a snide look, this made Bambi's mother resentful towards her. Kingsley's mother said " get away from me and my son or there
will be a fight between us"," no I will not leave Bambi behind and let you hurt him, I will kill you if you don't stop threatening us " said Bambi's mother "well then lets get this done and over with, I will rip you to pieces" said Kingsley's mother. They then
111112.title: something move in the tall grass.

1112.content: Kingsley's mother helped Kingsley get in to the water by the river. Without warning Kingsley slipped and lost his footing. Kingsley's mother was forced to watch Kingsley brutally drown in the fast flowing river. She let out a loud cry of sadness to see her only son die in a horrific way. unfortunately she had made a big mistake by crying over the loss of Kingsley. Her loud crying had attracted the attention of a nearby hunter. within minutes the hunter found her and locked his inferred scope onto her heart. Kingsley's mother was then hit by a bullet. She did not have a chance to scream or react to the pain that hit her whole body. She fell to floor and died with a solemn look on her face.
1112.title: Put her self and Kingsley's life in danger ...

choices: They walk together into the sunlight
13.content: The beautiful doe's eyes began to tear up as she gazed upon her fawn. Kingsley happened to be her second attempt in bringing a new life into the world. Her first fawn was stillborn and it broke her heart. It was many months before she decided to give child birth another try. She had her doubts that she could ever have a happy healthy fawn of her own so when Kingsley was finally born, it was the most wonderful of miracles. She hadn't felt this kind of joy in a very long time. A soft muzzle wiped the off the tears now streaming down her face. "Why are you crying mommy?" asked the young fawn. His mother just smiled, giving him a loving nuzzle. "Its nothing," she replied. "I just love you so..." The concern in Kingsley's eyes faded, "I love you too mama," he smiled.
13.title: cry when she looked at her new born fawn.

info.brief_description: A young deer finds him self exploring the frost with his mother.
info.description:
Hello I am starting a interactive story about a young deer with his mother.
This is a set of rules that applies to story.

1.Must be SFW.
2. a Death can only happen with my permission.
3.If an aspect of the story is too silly it will be removed.
4.The setting must stay within the forest and its surrounding area.
5.only I am allowed to add certain aspects to the story.

What you can and cannot do.
1.you can change events within the forest.
2.you cannot kill off any deer or hunter without my permission.
3.you can give items to deer.
4.you can control what the characters say to each other.
5.Dream environments can only happen when a character is sleeping.
6.The dream setting can have death or injury inside it.
7.I will some times talk to you about the story.
8.you can have fun reading what I and others have added to the story.
9.I will fix things from time to time.
info.pretty_title: Rising dawn of the new deer.
